item.title: Matrices for developers
item.description: WARNING: Long article, big images, heavy GIFs. A few weeks ago I was on an android-user-group channel, when someone posted a question about Android’s Matrix.postScale(sx, sy, px, py) method and how it works because it was “hard to grasp”.
